resources.string: SpeedCalc is an application that performs calculations using physics formulas, specifically for calculating distance, speed, and time.

Albert Einstein, the brilliant physicist from Germany, revolutionized our understanding of the universe through his theory of relativity and the iconic equation E = mc².

His work not only transformed physics but also paved the way for modern technology and deeper insights into space, time, and energy.

As a Nobel laureate and humanist thinker, Einstein is also remembered for his views on peace, freedom, and humanity, making him one of the most influential figures in the history of science and the world.

This application was developed for Assessment 1 of the Mobile Programming course.
